name: Kalashtar
description: Kalashtar are a race of psionic humanoids connected to the spirits of dreams. They are often calm, introspective, and wise beyond their years. This spiritual connection grants them telepathic abilities and resilience against mental attacks. Kalashtar are known for their serenity and strength of will, often serving as mediators, healers, or prophets.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common, Quori, and one other language of your choice.
special: Dual Mind: You have advantage on all Wisdom saving throws.
